About

My name is Drew and I am a Systems Librarian in New York.

I am also card-carrying Information Scientist. I enjoy work that involves collecting, sorting, organizing and making sense of the vast amounts of data, text and other meaningful symbols that drive societies and cultures. This page is an attempt to prove that.

If you'd like to know more:
